title: Mother Had a Secret
description: A true-life narrative, Tiffany Fletcher's biographical resource serves to liberate families living within the oppression of mental illness. She offers hope and perspective to those wrestling between the incredible pressure to keep "family secrets" and the desperate need to seek help and understanding.For more about the book from the author: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u84diq...
author: Tiffany Fletcher
